message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SE. 

The paper discusses the integration of information from disparate sources, which is a core topic in the field of databases (cs.DB). It also mentions the need for novel techniques that bring together different methods from databases and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper specifically mentions the World Wide Web as a practical application area, which falls under information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the need for flexible and transparent synthesis of information, which could involve machine learning techniques (cs.LG). Finally, the paper mentions the potential role of computational logic in information integration (cs.SE).
